neptune.quote: Sonically impressive and a thunderous force of nature
neptune.author: Kempsey, ClickRollBoom

neptune.quote: ...every detail was deeply cared about by the band. This is a project made with love and rage
neptune.author: Nick Tuttle, Misty Music Studio

neptune.quote: ...your songs are delicious barrels of riffs
neptune.author: Flashlight Faces

neptune.quote: Decayed | Remade was awesome but you took it to another level with [Neptune]. 10 out of 10. Fantastic
neptune.author: “Mad” Marky, The X-Friends

quote: [Eulogy] is one of the best indie rock songs I've heard
You weren't kidding when you said we wouldn't get bored
neptune.author: The Sound Ninja

neptune.quote: All hail mighty Neptune! All hail The Welcoming!
neptune.author: Sablique

neptune.quote: ...the different styles are weaved together flawlessly. I'm very jealous and you should be very proud
neptune.author: Rick, SparraLIMB

decayed-remade.quote: Some of the best rock/metal music I've heard [...] like APC, Thrice, and Cave In [...] really like the very thoughtful and imaginative lyrics
decayed-remade.author: Seth Crisp

decayed-remade.quote: ...there's a lot to appreciate here so if you're in the mood for genre-hopping [...] you'll really like the variety that's jam-packed into this LP.
decayed-remade.author: Adedamola Adeniyi

quote: Damn. [Loop] is easily better than 99% of songs I hear on my local rock station.
I am gonna need to take a candle making class so I can do something with all this melted face.
decayed-remade.author: TruckDog & the Go People

decayed-remade.quote: This is incredible [...] unique but also familiar.
decayed-remade.author: Victor Bebo

quote: [Snakeholder] has power and punch! Awesome vocals add to the lethal sonic bites!
[Revived] comes in like a perfectly thrown bomb for a game winning touchdown pass! The vocalist at quarterback the band goes downfield...unstopabble!
decayed-remade.author: Roger Gonzo

decayed-remade.quote: your music has been getting me through some shit
decayed-remade.author: Nicholas Mück

about.quote: it’s hard to truly ready yourself for the welcoming [...] you just let the riffs knock you over
about.author: Prime Birds

about.quote: your sound has 2 parts A Perfect Circle, one part CKY. You have created the ultimate forbidden music.
about.author: NuJ4X

about.quote: Honestly one of the best indie bands I have ever listened to
about.author: Kian Dray

epk.quote: [The Welcoming] has that definite undefinable, but 'you know it when you hear it' next level talent.
epk.author: Won't Say Rabbit

epk.quote: ...your music and the genre you're experimenting with is so beautiful and I want you to never stop.
epk.author: MrRockTable

epk.quote: Amazing performance it was so fun and y'all's energy is dope
epk.author: Em Herold
